Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|否往泰來|否滯|否極泰來|否極生泰|屯否|否去泰來|屯蹶否塞|否剝|否隔|否終而泰|否泰|否極必泰|否德|泰極而否|泰來否往|晦盲否塞|臧否|賢否不明|陟罰臧否|臧否人物|進可替否}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Interjection
Usage notes
subSections.text:
The kanji spelling in the "no" sense is rarely encountered in modern Japanese. It is more commonly written as {{m|ja|いいえ}}.

{{attention|ja|quotation seems to present usage as a noun}}
